name: Love Forever * Happy Valentine # 26 ****SOLD***
description:
SOLD

Happy Valentine Or just I Love You Always!
This was truly fun to create, here you see three large beautiful red roses in a large about 15" tall clear vase, filled with the fragrance of Damask Rose Potpourri and Akasha gems. The roses are accompanied by an assortment of feathers.

The vase has been decorated with rustic white ribbon and hand made bow.
My floral designs are built for maximum visual impact and longevity, with every leaf, flower, spray and accent piece carefully chosen and placed to give you nothing but quality in floral decor.

name: WEDDING UNITY CANDLES # 34
description:
Included in this set is: 2 white, smokeless and drip less European taper candles, fragrance free; 1 white 6" pillar candle with slight linen fragrance. These have been individually decorated with bridal embellishments and several blue Swarovski flat back crystals, along with blue ribbon and white modern romance bridal flowers, accented with white bows.

Included in this set and matching are 2 standard size taper candle holder, that have been decorated in the same fashion and style.

*Any styles can be some what duplicated in perhaps different colors and styles of candles and or holders*perhaps crystal holders - prizes will vary*
Please contact me for special orders, I be glad to work with you!

name: BABYS PINK CAKE  # 41            Disregard date of picture
description:
LITTLE PRINCESS 1ST CAKE, only out of diapers!

This diaper cake truly makes a great gift for the newborn baby and Mom.

The cake is tiered into three sections that are surrounded by pink silk ribbon, it's 1st tier is placed upon a 14" silver cardboard cake platter.

Each section holds a different amount of diapers and other items such as:

Tier #1: 42 #2 (12-18 lbs) Huggies diapers

Tier #2: 30 #2 (12-18 lbs) Luvs diapers along with 4 over sized, super soft infant washcloths

Tier #3: 12 #2 (12-18 lbs) Luvs diapers along with
3 lap-shoulder tees size medium 6-9 mo (19-26 lbs) and 4 pink shoulder spit towels

Topper consists of: 1 pink Snuggle Buddy (teddy)

MORE SURPRISES are attached around the cake such as:
1x  water teether, soothes tender gums for big smiles age 0-36 mo.

1x 3fl.oz Johnson baby oil-locks in up to 10x more moisture

1x 1fl.oz Johnson baby lotion

1x teething key ring

4x additional over sized, super soft infant washcloths (2 white, 2 yellow with dots)

1x yellow soft hug-gable duck, plush toy

1x No Spill GripN'Sip  7oz. cup, prevents spills and reduces leaks, anti-colic air system, Vari-Flo Valve allows child to control liquid's flow rate, soft and durable no spill silicone spout by Nuby (6mo. plus)

and 2 x small lollipops

*ALSO TAKING PERSONALIZED ORDERS TO FIT YOU AND YOUR BABY'S NEEDS OR FOR THAT UNIQUE GIFT FOR A SPECIAL SOMEONE*

name: SPRING SPANISH EXTRAVAGANZA # 56
description:
These spring colors have inspired me to put this lovely arrangement together.
Easter being right around the corner you could definitely make this part of your Easter decoration.
The vase is from Spain and perfectly coincides with the colors.

The vase stands 15 1/2" tall and with the flower together this arrangement reaches about 38".

name: Spring Lavender Birds of Paradise #55
description:
Beautiful flower arrangement!

Whether you need an arrangement for inside or outside these handpicked flowers will fit into any setting.
The beige base is 4 3/4" in height and the with 6 1/2".
